name: Grid Hell Demo
description:
"One day the darkness came, and took everyone's most important attribute." Story

Guide See, a girl who lost her eyes, through the darkness. See must confront her friends who have lost their way in the dark. Song lost her voice and Say lost her ears. Both gave themselves to the darkness.

Gameplay

Find your way through intense bullet hell patterns. With the power of the All-seeing Eye, you can slow down time to deal with the complex and ever moving maze of bullets. By grazing bullets you recharge your time energy.  Focus to slow down your movement and increase your fire power. In this state your Soul also becomes visible. Your soul is your most precious possession, don't let anyone touch it!

The demo has 2 levels, each with a boss battle at the end. Aim for a High Score by killing enemies, collecting pickups and grazing bullets.

Controls: Show your support!

Grid Hell is a side project I made while studying and working on Ever End. If you like the demo, consider showing your support! If many people like Grid Hell I'll keep working on it and make it a full fledged game!

You can contact me and/or follow me for project updates on Twitter: @8bitmysli
